derivation: middle voice from G4253 (προχειρίζομαι) and a derivative of G5495 (προχειρίζομαι);
strongs_def: to handle for oneself in advance, i.e. (figuratively) to purpose
outline:
1. to put into the hand, to deliver into the hands
  2. to take into one's hands
  3. to set before one's self, to prostrate, to determine
  4. to choose, to appoint
    1. for one's use
    2. for one's salvation
